name: Kava
description: Interledger Solutions for Blockchains, Wallets, and Exchanges
description_long: Kava is creating blockchain interoperability by creating Interledger (ILP) “connectors” or bridges that transfer value between different blockchains as a service. Kava is also creating a specialized tendermint-based blockchain designed to enhance the ILP user experience by enabling faster payment channel creation and settlement.
